content: CRED is awesome as a credit card payment/notifier app - you get timely notifications, automatic collection of credit card statements, etc. It's pretty easy to manage when all your credit card bills are in one place. But, as a rewarding app, it's just pure hype. More often than not, you get better deals in Amazon and Flipkart. Their jackpots are all ploy - haven't seen anyone winning these jackpots except once - more like a lottery. PS: In one of the credit card bill payment notifications, they missed the decimal point amounts. I paid the cc bill without validating against my statement. This was treated as a missed payment from my bank and few months later, my credit score got screwed up. So, verify against your statement everytime or pay a rupee more than what CRED says.
replyContent: Hi Hariharan, we understand that rewards are an important part of the CRED experience, and wouldn‚Äôt want you to feel that they‚Äôre not worth it. content: App works flawlessly and its quite clean and looks very good. Now, this review should ideally be a 5-Star.  Reason behind for 2-Star Rating: I have added around 5 cards to CRED on June 2nd and within hours there were suspicious transactions on one card (Issues by IndusInd). This led to the rating.  The last time I used that card for online payments was in May and that's on flipkart and earlier I used this cards mostly on OLA, PAYTM and Amazon.  Thank fully, the bank immediately blocked the transaction and card and hence no losses occurred.  Note: I am an active user of Credit cards for past 7-8 years and this never happened with me. I never did a transaction on sites which are not PCI compliant / genuine.  Though I am not suspecting, I am neither giving the app a benefit of doubt.

This means our card details (including cvv which no other app/ site saves) have been saved by cred and we are being given a false satisfaction that we are entering CVV ourselves. I could find no option to delete my saved debit and credit card in the cred app. As such, there is a high risk of misuse of my information if my credentials are stolen by someone from their app

replyContent: The offers are dynamic in nature and are based on availability. The offers are valid only until stocks last. There are a limited number of vouchers available at a time and are availed on a first-come basis.In the interim, you can always check for offers on the App to keep yourself updated with certain early bird offers.
